trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Vandalia
There were no other sightings in Vandalia on or around September 29th 2011
Summary: Object came from the east over the business i work at on third shift. A orange glowing pulsating boomarang shape craft with no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working third shift and went to the parking lot for lunch break which I take in my car. This happened on 09-29-11 at around 3:00 am. While getting into my car I noticed out of the corner of my left eye a very bright glowing object coming from the east at about 500 to 700 feet in the air. It moved very slow in a direct line and pulsated making no sound. It flew right directly above me and moved westward just south of the Dayton international airport near where I work. I watched it start to shoot up at about a 45 degree angle and slowly dissipeared out of site. I took a picture of it when it moved over above my head but the cell phone picture didn't come out very good and the object looked S shped in the pic. Never seen anything like it and consider my self lucky to see something unexplainable and I,ll never forget it as long as I live.
